means: 勒克瑙（印度北部城市）（北方邦首府）

sentence.Network_en: In Lucknow crowds of people defied the curfew to celebrate on the streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 在勒克瑙，成群的人们违抗宵禁令到街上去庆祝。

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...逐渐融入波斯和伊斯兰教文化，当时卡萨克舞蹈的处处可见，充满印度蒙兀儿伊斯兰教之独特风格(称奴利塔)。目前流传卡萨克舞是以奴利塔的要素为舞码的主要内容。奴利塔可细分两大派，一派源自拉克脑(lucknow)称为拉克脑，其重点在对内在感情的表现，另一派源自节普尔(Jaipur)称为节普尔，重点在脚步的变化表现。卡萨克舞蹈，最大的特色，舞者在脚踝上绑著近百的小铜铃，以脚尖舞动旋转，.
luckner 卢克纳, lucknow 勒克瑙保卫战, luckner 吕克纳尔

means.word_mean: 1. a city in northern India in Uttar Pradesh; during the Indian Mutiny its British residents were beseiged by Indian insurgents
2. the British residents of Lucknow were besieged by Indian insurgents during the Indian Mutiny (1857)

auth_sentence.content: Singh, an urban-studies professor at the University of Lucknow.

auth_sentence.content: Lucknow offers a case study of the challenges India's newer metropolises face.

auth_sentence.content: Of course, slums have always existed in Indian cities, including in Lucknow.
auth_sentence.res_content: Of course, slums have always existed in Indian cities, including in Lucknow.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Of course, slums have always existed in Indian cities, including in Lucknow.
